H0.text: A sunny window is the nearby object that a tulip growing in a pot placed at the center of a table will grow toward.

H1.text: An electric heater is the nearby object that a tulip growing in a pot, placed at the center of a table, will grow toward.

H2.text: A large bowl of water is the nearby object toward which a tulip growing in a pot will grow when the pot is placed at the center of a table.

H3.text: A fan blowing gently is the nearby object that a tulip growing in a pot, placed at the center of a table, will grow toward.

A4.text: Growth towards a light source is called positive phototropism.
